definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go or rove about (NH Aram. [[שׁוּט]] rove, row (Jon 1:13), swim (Is 25:11), stroke, besmear; v. also [[שׁוֹט]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: go or rove about: Pf. 3 pl., abs. [[שָׁטוּ הָעָם]] Nu 11:8 (J; gathering manna), so, c. [[ב]] loc., Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיׇּשֻׁטוּ]] 2Sa 24:8, Imv. ms. [[שׁוּט־נׇא]] v:2Sa 24:2, Inf. cstr. [[שׁוּט]] Job 1:7, [[שֻׁט]] Job 2:2 (both ‖[[הִתְהַלֵח ]]), perhaps also Ge 24:63 ([[לָשׁוּט]] for [[לָשׁוּךְַ]], so SyrVer Thes:1322 cf. Di Gunk Dr); Je 8:6 Du reads [[שָׁט]] for [[שָׁב]].—Pt. [[שָׁטִים]] v. [[שׁוּט]] denom. infr.

definitions.title: Pō‘l.
definitions.body: go eagerly, quickly, to and fro: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְשׁוֹטְטוּ לְבַקֵּשׁ]] Am 8:12 (‖[[וְנׇעוּ ]]); abs. [[יְשׁׂטְטוּ]] Da 12:4; c. [[ב]] loc., Imv. mpl. [[שׁוֹטְטוּ]] Je 5:1, Pt. pl. [[מְשׁוֹטְטִים]] Zec 4:10, [[מְשׁׂטְטוֹת]] 2Ch 16:9 (both of ´[[עְינֵי י]]:).

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: Imv. fpl., [[ב]] loc., [[הִתְשׁוֹטַטְנׇת]] Je 49:3 run to and fro.
